title: Witch Chiffon
alternative_title: Witch Chiffons ; Wū Shā ; 巫纱
status: Witch Chiffons ; Wū Shā ; 巫纱
description:
Description :
        Witch ChiffonThe last witch in the world with the greatest spiritual power, Yuyan, who lives in seclusion in a cave, has been predicted to be killed by a man. Four men with their own secrets shatter her quiet life. When the lu** for power brings forth destruction, disease and natural disasters, she must take on the mission of saving the world. The secrets that have been kept for a long time are revealed to the world, amidst deception, lies, and pain.
